q1: How much can the file size be reduced?
a1: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with many images typically see the largest reductions, often 50-80% smaller. Text-heavy PDFs may see smaller reductions.
q2: Does compression reduce the quality of my PDF?
a2: The tool uses smart compression that targets embedded images while preserving text sharpness. The result is visually very close to the original in most cases.
a3: Password-protected PDFs need to be unlocked first. Use our Unlock PDF tool to remove the protection, then compress the file.
